subject: Question about pricing and quotes
body: Can you please send me a detailed quotation for your professional package?

subject: System Down
body: I have been facing major system crashes since yesterday. I urgently need help fixing this error.

subject: Where is my invoice
body: I need the invoice for order #2025. Please forward it ASAP.

subject: Partnership idea
body: I am reaching out to propose a partnership with your team on a new AI project.

subject: I want to unsubscribe
body: Stop sending me these newsletters, I want to cancel my subscription now.

subject: General Inquiry
body: Just checking if you can help me with a small data science project I have.
